name: PowerCenter:Use Mapplets
description:
Folder should have at least a ratio number of Mapplets/total number of Mappings greater than X%.
The X threshold is a parameter and can be changed at will
output:
This report lists all Folders with number of Mapplets/total Mappings ratio lower than X %.
It provides the following information
Folder full name, ratio value
rationale: For understandability or speed of development, maintainability and evolutivity management, use mapplets for complex transformation logic packaging or reuse.
remediation: Create mapplets to reuse and/or package complex transformation logic.
